note:
Hello, I am a fantasy writer working on getting published. My other hobbies include photography, stop motion, crafting, gaming, anime, movies, and cooking.

I also write a blog. You can find it below. There I write about my journey in writing and getting published. You can also find my scattered poems from all over the place there.
